abstract: In a proposal to the newspaper industry, Google said that it is developing a micropayment system that online publishers could use to charge for their content.
snippet: In a proposal to the newspaper industry, Google said that it is developing a micropayment system that online publishers could use to charge for their content.
lead_paragraph: Update | 11:19 p.m. Added link to Nieman Journalism Lab, which first publicized the Google filing.Google is planning to roll out a system of micropayments within the next year and hopes that newspapers will use it as they look for new ways to charge users for their content.

headline.main: Google Plans Tools to Help News Media Charge for Content
